# Valeria Sunforge - Level 20 Test Character

A Paladin 6 / Sorcerer 14 multiclass (Sorcadin) designed to test all character systems.

## Basic Information

| Field | Value |
|-------|-------|
| Name | Valeria Sunforge |
| Ruleset | dnd2024 |
| Species | Aasimar |
| Background | Noble |
| Total Level | 20 |

## Class Progression

| Class | Subclass | Level |
|-------|----------|-------|
| Paladin | Oath of Devotion | 6 |
| Sorcerer | Divine Soul | 14 |

### Why This Multiclass
- Paladin 6 gets Extra Attack and Aura of Protection
- Sorcerer 14 gets high-level spell slots for Divine Smite
- Divine Soul Sorcerer for thematic synergy and access to Cleric spells
- Tests: multiclass requirements, spell slot calculation, multiple subclasses

## Ability Scores

Using 2024 rules: Background (Noble) provides +2/+1 ability score bonuses.

| Intelligence | 8 | - | - | - | 8 | -1 |
| Wisdom | 10 | - | - | - | 10 | +0 |
| Charisma | 15 | - | - | +6 (3 ASIs) | 21 | +5 |

For testing purposes, we'll cap at 20 (modifier +5).

### Armor Class
- Plate Armor: 18
- Shield: +2
- **Total AC: 20**

### Proficiency Bonus: +6 (Level 20)

### Spell Attack / Save DC

- Spell Save DC: 8 + 5 + 6 = 19

## Class Features

### Paladin Features
- Divine Sense
- Lay on Hands (30 points)
- Fighting Style: Defense (+1 AC... update AC to 21)
- Divine Smite
- Divine Health
- Sacred Oath: Oath of Devotion
  - Oath Spells
  - Channel Divinity: Sacred Weapon, Turn the Unholy
- Extra Attack
- Aura of Protection (+5 to all saves within 10 ft)

### Sorcerer Features
- Spellcasting
- Font of Magic (14 Sorcery Points)
- Metamagic (4 options)
- Sorcerous Origin: Divine Soul
  - Divine Magic (access to Cleric spells)
  - Favored by the Gods
  - Empowered Healing
  - Angelic Form (bonus action wings, 30 ft fly)
- Sorcerous Restoration (regain 4 sorcery points on short rest)

### Aasimar Traits (2024)
- Celestial Resistance (resistance to necrotic and radiant)
- Darkvision 60 ft
- Healing Hands (heal HP = level once per long rest)
- Light Bearer (Light cantrip)
- Celestial Revelation (choose one at level 3):
  - Radiant Soul (wings + radiant damage bonus)
